com.esri.mo2.map.draw
Interface LegendClass

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Comparable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseLegendClass
public interface LegendClass
extends Cloneable, Comparable

A LegendClass is a representation of a value or a Range of values within a Legend. Each LegendClass is shown in a Legend as a Symbol and a label. By default the label is the String representation of the Value or the Range, but you can optionally change it, if desired.

It is possible to store null for the Value. This will usually mean that the LegendClass represents the "other" symbol for a ValueMapRenderer. Code that uses a ValueMapRenderers LegendClass objects must be sensitive to this possibility.

See Also:
LegendInfo
